EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! Step Forward Assessment Invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Invitation to Assessment
Dear {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.Associate__c},
Thank you for applying to Step Forward. You have taken the first step towards securing your future and gaining 12 months of invaluable paid employment. We are pleased to tell you that you have been successful in your application and we would like to invite you to the first stage of our assessment event.
We were very impressed with your application so congratulations on reaching this stage! The assessment event is an opportunity for us to get to know each other better and find out if Step Forward is the right programme for you. The details of your assessment are as follows:
Date: Friday 3rd July 2015 Time: 15:55 - 19:00 Please arrive: 15:40
Please confirm your attendance here by Monday 28th June. If you do not confirm your attendance by the deadline we cannot guarantee that we can save you a space.Address: Union Jack Club, Sandell Street, London, SE1 8UJ
Stage two of the assessment will be take place on Saturday 21 and Sunday 22 February so please keep these dates free. We will send another email by Friday 13 February with more detailed information about the assessment and tips on how to be successful.
If you have any queries in the meantime please contact step.forward@the-challenge.org with ‘Step Forward Assessment’ in the subject title or call 0203 542 2400.
Well done once again for reaching this stage, we look forward to meeting you.
----------------------------------------------------
Important information about the assessment:
Stage 1: Friday 3rd July
- Teamwork activities
- Pathway activities
We will send details of Stage 2 in an email by Friday 13 February. Please note the address for Stage 2 will be different.
Stage 2: Saturday 21 or Sunday 22 February
- Individual interviews
Best wishes,
The Step Forward Team
